abstract: “I’m happy that the V word isn’t so nasty anymore,” the longtime TV host Carol Burnett says.
snippet: “I’m happy that the V word isn’t so nasty anymore,” the longtime TV host Carol Burnett says.
lead_paragraph: With Rosie O’Donnell starring in a variety show Wednesday night, and with similar shows being contemplated by Fox and CBS, we wondered: how does Carol Burnett, the star of one of TV’s longest-running variety shows, feel about the possible revival of the format?

headline.main: Variety Genre is ‘Sorely Missed,’ Burnett Says
